computation_definitions: Divorce is a final legal dissolution of a marriage, that is, the separation of husband and wife which confers the parties the right to remarriage under civil, religious and/or other provisions, according to the laws of each country
comments_limitations: Data for the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina are the sum of data for cantons.
